pr_title: Modify /search2 to return a list of words to highlight

timeline.message:
Update DefaultSearch.QueryParser for Java 8

That is, use the enhanced for loop; and diamond operator for generic constructors.

While at it, remove an unused variable (tokens) and some old NLS comments.

Return words to hightlight from /search2

We need to return which words should be highlighted from a query, so the New UI can emulate the word highlighting in search results of the legacy UI.

timeline.bodyText: This wasn't used - other than to store values (never read from).
